typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.health.PathologyDocumentClassification
typeDescription.description: A classification for a single pathology document for specific elements and code like diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: category
featureDescription.description: The category of the document, e.g., MAMMA.

featureDescription.name: diagnosis
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: topography
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant topography.

featureDescription.name: morphology
featureDescription.description: The code of the relevant morphology.

featureDescription.name: tumor
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant tumor.

featureDescription.name: node
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant node.

featureDescription.name: metastasis
featureDescription.description: The TNM code of the relevant metastasis.

featureDescription.name: grading
featureDescription.description: The relevant grading.

featureDescription.name: location
featureDescription.description: The relevant location.

featureDescription.name: rClass
featureDescription.description: The relevant R-classification.

featureDescription.name: side
featureDescription.description: The relevant side, e.g., L, R, T.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesAffected
featureDescription.description: The amount of affected sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesTested
featureDescription.description: The amount of tested sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: thickness
featureDescription.description: The thickness of the skin tumor.

featureDescription.name: lymphaticInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the lymphatic system.

featureDescription.name: vascularInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the vascular system.

featureDescription.name: perineuralInvasion
featureDescription.description: The invasion of the cancer to the space surrounding a nerve.

featureDescription.name: resultDate
featureDescription.description: The date of the result/findings.

featureDescription.name: scores
featureDescription.description: List of different scores, e.g. GleasonScore.

featureDescription.name: categoryAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the category of the document.

featureDescription.name: diagnosisConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant diagnosis.

featureDescription.name: topographyConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant topography.

featureDescription.name: morphologyConcept
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant morphology.

featureDescription.name: tumorAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant tumor.

featureDescription.name: nodeAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant node.

featureDescription.name: metastasisAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant metastasis.

featureDescription.name: gradingAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant grading.

featureDescription.name: locationAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant location.

featureDescription.name: rClassAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant R-classification.

featureDescription.name: sideAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the relevant side.

featureDescription.name: lymphnodesAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: sentinelLymphnodesAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the sentinel lymph nodes.

featureDescription.name: thicknessAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the thickness of the skin tumor.

featureDescription.name: lymphaticInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the lymphatic system.

featureDescription.name: vascularInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the vascular system.

featureDescription.name: perineuralInvasionAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the invasion of the cancer to the space surrounding a nerve.

featureDescription.name: resultDateAnnotation
featureDescription.description: Optional annotation representing the date of the findings/result.

featureDescription.name: label
featureDescription.description: The category of the annotation, e.g., final.

featureDescription.description: The category of the annotation, e.g., final.
